snippet.title: Homunculus - A short steampunk point & click adventure game made for Ludum Dare 52!
snippet.description:
Download for free on itch.io https://digital-mosaic-games.itch.io/homunculus?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt As a prominent student of Halnemburk University, you are invited to your professor's laboratory to witness the biggest scientific breakthrough in history. Professor Gragmagor is about to harvest his fruit he has been growing for years...

➡️ More from Digital Mosaic Games https://digital-mosaic-games.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More Ludum Dare 52 games https://itch.io/games/tag-ludum-dare-52?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
